FeatherColumnWriter
public abstract class BooleanRandomWriter
extends AbstractColumnWriter

Partial FeatherColumnWriter for random access boolean columns.

writeDataBytes

public long writeDataBytes(java.io.OutputStream out)
                    throws java.io.IOException
Description copied from class: AbstractColumnWriter
Writes the bytes constituting the data stream for this column, excluding any optional validity mask. Note the output does not need to be aligned on an 8-byte boundary.
